mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (name, telphone, program_address,priority, create_time, notes,count) VALUES (#{customer.name}, #{customer.telphone}, #{customer.programAddress},#{customer.priority},#{customer.createTime}, #{customer.notes},#{customer.count})
mapper.select: SELECT `id`, name, program_address, telphone, priority, create_time, notes FROM customer ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, name, program_address, priority, create_time, notes FROM customer WHERE telphone = #{tel} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, name, program_address, telphone, create_time FROM customer WHERE notes = #{notes} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 0,4;
SELECT count FROM customer where priority=1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0,1 ;
